00047 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::mfKdTree(int dim) 
00048 {
00049         MF_ASSERT(dim);
00050         
00051         root = NULL;
00052         ndim = dim;
00053         n = 0;
00054 }

00056 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::~mfKdTree()
00057 {
00058         mfList< mfKdTreeNode<sObject> * > lista;
00059 
00060         mfKdTreeNode<sObject> *node = root;
00061 
00062         while(node)
00063         {
00064                 if(node->p[0])
00065                         lista.insert(node->p[0]);
00066                 if(node->p[1])
00067                         lista.insert(node->p[1]);
00068                         
00069                 delete node;
00070                 
00071                 lista.erase(0);
00072 
00073                 if(!lista.empty())
00074                         node = lista.first();
00075                 else
00076                         node = NULL;
00077         }
00078 }

00080 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> void mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::insert(sObject obj)
00081 {
00082         add(obj);
00083 }

00086 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> sObject mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::nearest(sObject obj)
00087 {
00088         mfKdTreeNode<sObject> *node = nearestSearch(obj);
00089         
00090 //      MF_ASSERT(node);
00091         if (node)
00092                 return node->ptr;
00093         else
00094                 return NULL;
00095 }
00096 
00097 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> sObject mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::nearestAndInsert(sObject obj)
00098 {
00099         mfKdTreeNode<sObject> *node = nearestSearch(obj);
00100         
00101         add(obj);
00102         
00103         MF_ASSERT(node);
00104 
00105         return node->ptr;
00106 }

00108 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> mfKdTreeNode<sObject>*mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::add(sObject obj)
00109 {
00110         mfKdTreeNode<sObject> *leaf = root, *ant = NULL;
00111         int ld = 0, dim = 0;
00112         
00113         while(leaf)
00114         {
00115                 if(comp.greater(leaf->ptr, obj, dim))
00116                 {
00117                         ant = leaf;
00118                         ld = 0;
00119                 }
00120                 else
00121                 {
00122                         ant = leaf;
00123                         ld = 1;
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 leaf = ant->p[ld];
00127 
00128                 if(++dim == ndim)
00129                         dim = 0;
00130         }
00131 
00132         leaf = new mfKdTreeNode<sObject>;
00133 
00134         leaf->ptr = obj;
00135         leaf->p[0]  = NULL;
00136         leaf->p[1] = NULL;
00137 
00138         if(ant)
00139                 ant->p[ld] = leaf;
00140         else
00141         {
00142                 root = leaf;
00143                 ant = root;
00144         }
00145                 
00146         n++;
00147 
00148         return ant;
00149 }
00150 
00151 template <class sObject, class sObjectCompare> mfKdTreeNode<sObject>* mfKdTree<sObject,sObjectCompare>::nearestSearch(sObject obj)
00152 {
00153         mfKdTreeNode<sObject> *leaf = root, *ant = NULL;
00154         int ld, dim = 0;
00155         
00156         while(leaf)
00157         {
00158                 if(comp.greater(leaf->ptr, obj, dim))
00159                 {
00160                         ant = leaf;
00161                         ld = 0;
00162                 }
00163                 else
00164                 {
00165                         ant = leaf;
00166                         ld = 1;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 leaf = ant->p[ld];
00170         
00171                 if(++dim == ndim)
00172                         dim = 0;
00173         }
00174         
00175         if(ant)
00176                 return ant;
00177         else
00178                 return NULL;
00179 }
